Amar Ezzahi (1 Jenụwarị 1941 30 Nọvemba 2016) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu na onye na-akpọ mandole
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Chaabi, egwu ọdịnala nke Algiers.
A mụrụ Amar Ezzahi dị ka Amar Ait-Zaï na Ain El Hammam, obodo nta nke Kabylie, Algeria, na 1 Jenụwarị 1941. Ọ tolitere na Casbah nke Algiers. Ọ bụ nwa mgbei mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị.

Ezzahi bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-akpọ mandole. Ọ malitere idekọ egwu na 1963. N'afọ 1976, o dekọrọ abọm abụọ. O nyere naanị otu egwu, na 10 Febụwarị 1987 na Algiers. Kama nke ahụ, ọ na-eme ihe n'ebe mepere emepe dị ka ebe oriri na ọṅụṅụ, karisia n'oge nnọkọ ezinụlọ. Ọzọkwa, ọ gbapụrụ mgbasa ozi ma jụ nyocha ikike nwebisiinka. Ọ bụ onye isi nke Chaabi, egwu ọdịnala nke Algiers.
Ezzahi biri ndụ ịta ahụhụ: ọ lụghị nwanyị, ọ nweghịkwa ụmụ.

Ezzahi nwụrụ na 30 Nọvemba 2016. Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Azzedine Mihoubi, Minista Ọdịbendị nke Algeria, gara n'ụlọ ya iji sọpụrụ ya. E mere emume olili ozu ya n'ụlọ alakụba n'ụbọchị na-esote, 1 Disemba, e lie ya na ili ozu El Kettar.
Emere emume iji sọpụrụ Ezzahi, nke Abdelkader Chaou na Kamel Aziz mere, na Arab World Institute na 3 Disemba 2016 na Paris, France.
